name: Backup File
summary: Learn about .OLD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The ".old" extension is often placed after the original file suffix of a file when a newer version of the file has been created or saved by a certain program. For example, document.doc.old would be a backup copy of the document.doc file. The ".old" extension may have to be deleted in order for the file to be opened correctly.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
